play.tooltip: Setup or play a single player or LAN world.

patreon.tooltip: Support Awakening and get cool in game rewards!

sponsor_button.tooltip: Get a dedicated server from our awesome sponsors!

text: Thanks for over 350,000 downloads (and counting)!
Tip #1: Theres also a 'lite' version of the pack available on Twitch.
Tip #2: Pressing 'L' will toggle the light level overlay.
Tip #3: Pressing 'C' will toggle viewing chunk borders and edges.
Tip #4: All crops must be planted on crop sticks.
Tip #5: Some seeds have special needs, press 'U' on them to see them.
Tip #6: Mobs spawn stronger at lower Y levels.
Tip #7: Mobs are stronger in other dimensions, go prepared!
Tip #8: Most recipes are altered, use NEI to double check them!
Tip #9: Vanilla tools are disabled, follow the tinkers quest line.
Tip #10: Playing with friends is fun, servers are super cheap >>>
Tip #11: Stuck? Consult the quest book.
Tip #12: You can download and install Optifine to increase FPS.
Tip #13: Stuck? Check out the help & guides link on the main menu.
Tip #14: Becoming a Patreon grants sweet in game rewards!
Tip #15: You can support the pack by telling your friends about it!
Tip #16: Press 'U' to view a schematic of most multiblocks.
Tip #17: Press '=' to quickly create a new waypoint.
Tip #18: Press 'P' to place an item down in the world!
Tip #19: All custom music in the pack is royalty free.
Tip #20: Mob griefing is toggled in the sprinkles for vanilla config.
Tip #21: Restore local backups from single player world load screen.
Tip #22: The nether really is hell, prepare before going!
Tip #23: It is best to progress through mods together.
Tip #24: Need a server? Check out our sponsors - BisectHosting >>>
Tip #25: Awakening has had more updates than any other pack.
Tip #26: The wiki has some really useful info like ore levels.
Tip #27: Type 'mining level' in NEI to show tool mining levels.
Tip #28: Press 'O' to hide NEI when it blocks recipe outputs etc.
Tip #29: Automate all the things!
Tip #30: Press 'Ctrl' + 'R' to show a different Tip!
Tip #31: Always remember to take breaks when gaming!
Tip #32: Armored mobs? Rapiers and crossbows are armour piercing!
Tip #33: The pack ships with optimal graphics options already set.
Tip #34: There are Awakening servers listed on the Discord.
Tip #35: A server.properties file can be found in every world folder.
Tip #36: Follow @theshadowake on Twitter for all the Awakening news.
Tip #37: Build horizontally not vertically to help performance.
Tip #38: If recipes are missing try the '/mt reload' command.
Tip #39: There are several easter eggs hidden in the pack.
Tip #40: The quest book is a great guide to mods.
Tip #41: Spiders can web you if you are hit by one.
Tip #42: Want your fave YouTuber to play Awakening? Let them know!
Tip #43: Want your fave streamer to play Awakening? Let them know!
Tip #44: Pressing 'Q' will drop your currently held item on the ground.
Tip #45: External guides/wiki's recipes are not always right, use NEI.
Tip #46: For the best experience please use 'eng_US' language.
Tip #47: The 'Last Stand' enchantment can be a real lifesaver.
Tip #48: Caving usually yields more ores than strip mining.
Tip #49: Shooting a portal gun at the moon may be bad idea....
Tip #50: Lava monsters really don't like water.
Tip #51: Claim land with the map icon to the left of your inventory.
Tip #52: Chunkload with the map icon to the left of your inventory.
